title: Mildred Bailey - The Rockin' Chair Lady (1931-50) Decca GRP
description:
MILDRED BAILEY - THE ROCKIN' CHAIR LADY (1931-1950)

Mildred Bailey - vocals, with accompaniment detailed below.

Mildred Bailey And Her Alley Cats
Bunny Berigan (tp), Johnny Hodges (as), Teddy Wilson (p), Grachan Moncur (b), December 6, 1935

01. Willow Tree    [3:19]
02. Honeysuckle Rose    [2:56]
03. Squeeze Me    [3:02]
04. Down-Hearted Blues    [3:22.]

Casa Loma Orchestra
Joe Hostetter, Bo Ashford, Bobby Jones (tp), Pee Wee Hunt, Billy Rauch (tb), Glen Gray, Clarence Hutchenrider, Kenny Sargent, Pat Davis (reeds), Mel Jenssen (vl), Joe Hall (p), Gene Gifford (g), Stanley Dennis (b), Tony Briglia (d), probablt Gene Gifford (arr), September 15, 1931

05. Blues In My Heart    [3:09]
06. You Call It Madness (But I Call It Love)    [3:08]
07. When It's Sleepy Time Down South    [3:02]
08. Wrap Your Troubles In Dreams    [3:08]

The Delta Rhythm Boys (vocal quartet), and unknown (cl, g, b, d; p added on track 10) February 24 (9-10) & March 14 (11-13), 1941

09. When That Man Is Dead And Gone    [2:42]
10. Jenny    [3:17]
11. Georgia On My Mind    [3:22]
12. Rockin' Chair    [2:37]
13. Sometimes I'm Happy    [3:11]

Herman Chittison (p), Dave Barbour (g), Frenchy Covetti (b), Jimmy Hoskins (d); Delta Rhythm Boys added on track 14; June 13, 1941

14. Ev'rything Depends On You    [3:14]
15. Lover, Come Back To Me    [3:02]
16. All Too Soon    [3:28]

Chittison & The Delta Rhythm Boys only; June 24, 1941

17. It's So Peaceful In The Country    [3:16]

Harry Sosnick And His Orchstra
Billy Butterfield (tp), Jack Jenney (tb), Jimmy Lytell (cl), Sal Franzella (b-cl), Billy Kyle (p), Carmen Mastren (g), Charlie Barbour (b), O'Niel Spencer (d), February 12, 1942

18. More Than You Know    [2:36]

Vic Schoen And His Orchestra
John Best (tp), Murray McEachern, Ed Kusby, Hoyt Bohannon, Sy Zentner (tb), Wilbur Schwartz, Ted Nash, Johnny Rotella, Rudy Herman (reeds), Willy Usher (p), Al Hendrickson (g), Joe Mondragon (b), Irv Cottler (d); April 25, 1950

19. Cry, Cry, Cry    [3:03]
20. Blue Prelude    [3:06]

1994 Decca/GRP/MCA

None of these tracks are on the Mosaic Mildred Bailey box. I think the first four tracks may be on the elusive Bunny Berigan box
